articles.title: Katie Taylor to defend undisputed title against American former world champ in Leeds - The42
articles.description: ‘Enjoy your belts while you still have them,’ Texan Jennifer Han has told Taylor. ‘I will see you in September.’
articles.content:
KATIE TAYLOR WILL defend her undisputed lightweight crown against former featherweight world titlist Jennifer Han in Leeds on Saturday, 4 September.

articles.title: Bank Of America Earnings Mixed; Citigroup, Wells Fargo On Tap - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Bank of America earnings were mixed, at best, with Citigroup and Wells Fargo due to report before the open. BAC stock fell.
articles.content:
Bank of America (BAC) reported mixed Q2 results, while Citigroup (C) and Wells Fargo (WFC) beat Wednesday.

articles.title: Cuban American protesters shut down expressway in Miami, blame Biden for lack of support - Fox News
articles.description: Hundreds of Cuban American protesters blocked a major expressway in Miami on Tuesday demanding President Biden do more to support the people of Cuba.
articles.content:

articles.title: A new poll shows why some vaccine-hesitant Americans decided to get the Covid-19 shot - CNN Philippines
articles.description: A quarter who'd gotten the vaccine after initial hesitation said they had been reassured to see other people getting vaccinated without ill effects.

articles.author: Paul J. Weber and Will Weissert
articles.title: Texas Democrats leave state to try to stop GOP voting bill - CTV News
articles.description: Democrats in the Texas Legislature bolted Monday for Washington, D.C., and said they were ready to remain there for weeks in a second revolt against a GOP overhaul of election laws, forcing a dramatic new showdown over voting rights in America.
